77.heading: Comebacks.
77.title: "Born to be Superman!"
77.author: Paul Kupperberg, writer ; Carmine Infantino, penciller ; Bob Oksner, inker ; Milton Snapinn, letterer ; Gene D'Angelo, colorist ; Julius Schwartz, editor
notes: Summary (by Mary Walker): Superman suddenly lost his powers at 16 and is now married to Lana Lang. He is a supermarket executive. Luthor recalls being in prison having been tried as an adult and sentenced to 20 years of which he served 13 before parole. He would have served longer if they could have proven he killed Superboy. He wishes Superboy were still alive so he could 'have the pleasure of killing him all over again!'. Kent becomes more uncomfortable with his powerlessness with Lana thinking that it has become an obsession. She recalls how she and Pete Ross found the unconscious Superboy and got him home. Luthor stages a comeback with Superman there to meet him. Superman reveals how he tried to use the various forms of kryptonite to regain his powers and created a belt which gives him a semblance of them.
